stimulusHtml: If the imposition of a per-unit tax on a good reduces the total consumer surplus by more than the reduction of total producer surplus in a competitive market, then which of the following must be true?
choicesHtml: The price sellers receive decreases by more than the amount of the tax.
The price buyers pay increases by more than the amount of the tax.
Demand is less elastic than supply.
Demand is more elastic than supply.
Demand and supply are both unit elastic.
